**Feature description:** Would it be possible to create a version of the image that does not use Anaconda?

<!--- 
Provide a detailed description of the feature or improvement you are proposing. What specific solution would you like? What is the expected behaviour? 

Add any other context, screenshots, or code snippets about the feature request here as well.  
-->

**Problem and motivation:**

Since Anaconda changed their [Terms of Service](https://www.anaconda.com/terms-of-service), companies with more than 200 employees must purchase a license to use the Anaconda repo. My understanding is that this also prevents companies from using images like this that rely on that repo. I am hoping that we could make conda an optional part of the ML-Workspace to prevent conflicts with their ToS.
